title: MS60026: Industrial Polymer Production Technology - Quick Facts
text:
MS60026
Course name | INDUSTRIAL POLYMER PRODUCTION TECHNOLOGY
Offered by | Materials Science
Credits | 4
L-T-P | 3-1-0
Previous Year Grade Distribution
{{{grades}}}
Semester | {{{semester}}}

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisite: None Processing technology : introduction, mixing, blending, extrusion, calendaring, molding, coating, bonding metal/powder, building-hand/spray lay up, forming, vulcanizing/curing-steam, LCM, fluidised bed, continuous, composite making, finishing. Compounding technology : introduction, formulations, ingredient selection, sequence of ingredient addition - its science and technology. Production technology: General purpose O rings, seals, bushes, tapes, blown films, cellular products, hot water bag, ice bag, battery containers, decorative laminates, resin based composites, etc. Engineering products antivibration mountings, bumper guards, shock absorber, axle blocks, dock fenders, bridge bearings, etc. Industrial products - beltings, hoses, footwears, cables, sports goods. Automobile products: tyres of cycle, rickshaw, two wheelers, three wheelers, cars, passengers, trucks, earth movers, giant tyres, tyre design and construction. Industrial quality control, industrial trouble shooting, destructive and non-destructive testing, case study.
